definition: variant of 拿破崙|拿破仑[Na2 po4 lun2]
to hold/to seize/to catch/to apprehend/to take/(used in the same way as 把[ba3]: to mark the following noun as a direct object)
broken/damaged/worn out/lousy/rotten/to break, split or cleave/to get rid of/to destroy/to break with/to defeat/to capture (a city etc)/to expose the truth of

pinyin: Na2 po4 lun2 · Bo1 na2 ba1

sentences.english: Well,I suppose one possibility would be to say the guy in New York is Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 我猜其中一个可能性会是，纽约家伙是拿破仑。

sentences.english: The painter depicted Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo.
sentences.chinese: 画家描绘了滑铁卢战役中的拿破仑。

sentences.english: The novel is set in Edinburgh and the Lothians at the time of the Napoleonic Wars.
sentences.chinese: 小说的场景设置在爱丁堡和拿破仑战争时期的锡兰。

sentences.english: Neither the Concorde nor the Napoléon has a swimming pool.
sentences.chinese: 协和和拿破仑饭店都没有游泳池。

sentences.english: The quick, decisive victory that Napoleon expected never happened.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑期盼着的速决速胜迟迟没有发生。

sentences.english: Bfter a long campaign, the Duke of Willington's army defeated Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 颠末长长的战争，威灵顿公爵的部队打败了拿破仑。

sentences.english: Mongolian  conqueror Genghis Khan is riding a horse opposite  Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: “一代天骄”成吉思汗骑在马上与拿破仑并驾齐驱。

sentences.english: After a long campaign, the Duke of Willington's army defeated Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 经过长长的战役，威灵顿公爵的军队战胜了拿破仑。

sentences.english: He refused to see him, as he passed through on his return from the island of Elba.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑从厄尔巴岛回来时，他拒绝到路旁去欢迎他。

sentences.english: 1852 - Napoleon III becomes Emperor of France.
sentences.chinese: 1852年，拿破仑三世成为法兰西的皇帝。

sentences.english: He's just an insane guy who's got Napoleon's personality.
sentences.chinese: 他只不过是拥有拿破仑人格的疯子。

sentences.english: There was in him a headstrong little man who hated Napoleon.
sentences.chinese: 在他心里早就有个憎恨拿破仑的顽固小人儿了。

sentences.english: In the spring of 1812, Napoleon assembled an army of six hundred thousand men on the borders of Russia.
sentences.chinese: 1812年春，拿破仑在俄国边境屯兵60万。

sentences.english: Napoleon stood astride the early 19th century like a giant.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑像个巨人跨越19世纪初叶。

sentences.english: I am a foot taller than Napoleon and twice of the weight of Twiggy;
sentences.chinese: 我比拿破仑高一英尺，体重是特威格的两倍。

sentences.english: Napoleon bade him ride at his side and began questioning him.
sentences.chinese: 拿破仑吩咐他和自己并辔而行开始问他。

pinyin: Na2 po4 lun2 · Bo1 na2 ba1

definition: Benito Mussolini (1883-1945), Italian fascist dictator, "Il Duce", president 1922-1943

pinyin: Ya4 li4 shan1 da4 Da4 di4
Shen2 sheng4 Luo2 ma3 Di4 guo2

definition: Bismarck (name)/Otto von Bismarck (1815-1898), Prussian politician, Minister-President of Prussia 1862-1873, Chancellor of Germany 1871-1890
variant of 邱吉爾|邱吉尔[Qiu1 ji2 er3]
Charlemagne (c. 747-c. 814), King of the Franks, Holy Roman Emperor from 800
